122.content:
You decided you should go forward. You turned right, and continued forwards, soon coming upon a red door with gold trimmings. You opened it and stepped through, and before you were three other doors along a blank, white wall. The three doors were identical. Before you continued forwards, you heard the speakers come on.

"Uh oh!" you heard Putrina say. "Hope our little friend here has a rabbit's foot on him, cause he just found himself in the smell roulette!" You then heard strange, casino noises play over the speakers, before she continued speaking. "Here, our participant has to go through two rooms, each with a set of identical doors. Though he'll find less doors in the next area. The problem? Two of the doors lead to the next room, while one of the doors leads to a room with one of our smelly guards! And he'll have no way of knowing unless he steps through one of the doors, which'll seal off behind him! Is luck on your side, pal?" With that, the speaker shut off, and you had to worry about this guard room.

In front of you were the three doors. They were all identical, and had no way of discerning which one held a guard. You couldn't even sniff for a guard. Looks like you'll just have to make a lucky choice. You "eenie-meenie-minie-moe" through the doors, and eventually settle on...

123.content:
You decide that your best option is forward. After all, it was right in front of you. So, you moved forward, and heard the doors shut behind you. As you progressed, the walls began to look more and more like a basement. And soon, you encountered a white door that looks like it's made of wood. Though, from the touch, it feels heavy and metallic. You open the door, and cross through it. Once you cross, the door shuts behind you. Before you can be surprised at that, a heavy churning noise catches your attention.

In the middle of a large, cube room looking like a giant basement, you saw something with shaped like a giant bear. However, instead of bearing fur and flesh, the creature was made of metal, and had dials on it. You saw one dial had the settings "Warm, Medium, Cold," "normal, heavy, permanent press, delicate," and "Extra Rinse." In fact, it sort of looks like a washing machine in pieces. In particular, you saw a window over its "stomach" that shows filthy water and clothing within being spun and tossed around within. However, that window doesn't appear to have any hinges or other way to open it. Instead, you saw two holes: one within a mechanism resembling a large muzzle that looked like it'd function as a throat, and one right on its backside that sort of looks like an anus. Right above that hole, there's a plug that leads from the machine to an outlet on a wall far behind it.

You heard the speakers turn on.

"Welcome, welcome welcome! Welcome to your first challenge, Laundry!" you heard Putrina's voice say. "And, you just happen to be on laundry duty! Before you isi the maze's personal laundry machine! It's programmed to 'wash' our employees' clothing. As long as this machine remains functional, the route ahead remains locked. Your goal, to advance, is to unplug the washer! But be warned... this machine is still hungry for filthy clothes." At the end of that sentence, you saw a pair of dirty shorts fall from the cieling, and right in front of it. At that, it opened its "mouth," and you heard a vacuum noise, right as the shorts are sucked up into the throat hole. You then see the shorts fall into that stomach covered by the window.

"And there's one place for filthy clothing to disappear to! Just imagine, getting pulled into a tight tube, sucked down or up, and forced into a cramped space filled with a broth of musk, sweat, and filthy clothing!" You decide to take that hall branching off of the left. You move forward cautiously, and turn towards that branch. As you go forward, you notice the walls are decorated in red hearts. There's another turn, and you go forward. However, ahead of you awaited your first challenge. The hall ahead looked to be about 5 yards long. Along either wall, instead of there being, well, "a wall," there were "kissing booths" set up into each wall, leaving you enough space to walk between. And how kind of our contestant to allow them the opportunity! Our 'trappers' are going to try and capture our victim, and plant a powerful smooch on whatever part of him they wish! He'd better be careful, though. A few of our kissers don't know a thing or two about hygiene." You audibly gulped at that statement. So, you'd have to run through these guys, and hopefully avoid a kiss. Now, you might've had enough room to walk between them, but there's no easy way to avoid there grasp. One person in a stall could reach over to touch the opposite stall. Maybe you could find an easier path-

You realized a retreat would likely make you another person's victim. It was either through the Kissing Hall, or winding up in someone's grasp. You had to power through!

Emboldened, you decide to just try and make it down the hall as fast as you could. As you entered, the anthros in the booth teased you by loudly smacking their lips.

Each step you took seemed to take more effort, and your movements were ever so slightly more uncoordinated and sluggish. Now that you were slower, it was a lot easier for the trappers to catch you. You manage to dodge a couple of them, but it wasn’t long before you get snatched again. “You don’t have to run around wearing all that in the maze, bro,” he said in a deep southern accent, gesturing to your simple outfit. Well… if you say so…” He said, seeming genuinely confused. Suddenly, though, he remembered what he grabbed you for. “Oh yeah! The kiss. I almost forget.”

He leaned forward, and planted a kiss on your chest. For some reason, feeling his lips on your chest made you shudder even more than the previous two kisses did. Perhaps it had something to do with the fact that he was a guy. With that, he smiled, patted you on the back, and let you go.

You braced yourself for the terrible effect that that kiss would have. At first, it seemed to have no effect at all… but then, you realized everyone was getting stinkier! Your nostrils were suddenly filled with the body odor of all the trappers in the room. Wait… no, on second thought, they weren’t getting stinkier… your nose was getting more sensitive!

You just had to make it to the end… but there was one more challenge in your way…

The last trapper was in a booth separate from all the others. Probably because it was absolutely huge, to match the size of its owner. "Our guards here have been given special suits that allow them to wade through the room at a leisurely pace. And, lucky for them, our contestant just so happened to volunteer to entertain them! Get moving, bud! Or else that stuff is gonna consume you, and leave your most sensitive places fully available to our guards!" By the time she finished speaking, you felt the rubber already approaching your ankles. You had to move, fast! Or else face whatever punishment these two could think up. You see at the other end of the room another door. You'd just have to struggle through the rubber-stuff, and hopefully move hard enough to escape the rubber's grip.
125.title: The Rubber Trap

13.content:
Name: Zakia
Sex: F
Species: Striped Hyena
Bio: A thrill-seeking martial artist and bodybuilder. She achieved moderate success in professional boxing, but found it to be less exciting than the underground bare-knuckle boxing rings she excelled in at home. When she was recruiting for Stinkkink, she thought it was the exact kind of high-stakes game she’d always been looking for. Sure, she’d usually be disinterested in weird porn things like this… but this seemed like the perfect opportunity to show these weirdos what a real badass is like! In preparation for her appearance, she has stopped showering, which, combined with her daily workouts, has given her a room-clearing body odor. She only has a bit of training with farts and such, but her sweat is very powerful. Her powerful offense is betrayed by her lack of defense, however. She has no experience with enduring the stench of others, and it’s likely she has severely underestimated her opponent’s smelliness...

Stench: 9
Sensitivity: 2
Endurance: 5
Likability: 2



“I’m telling you, man. I’m gonna stomp all over this little maze of there's,” you said, holding your phone between your cheek and shoulder while you busily got ready for her big day. You were standing around the locker room, talking to a friend of yours, who seemed to be doing his best to persuade you not to step foot in the maze. Apparently, all of the previous contestants have suffered horrible fates. “Yeah, sure, they stink.. but hell, stinking’s easy. I just went without showering for a month and I already stink like hell.” You chuckle. “You know what’s NOT easy? Taking an uppercut to the jaw. These ‘guardians’ won’t know what him ‘em…”

They seemed frustrated by your bravado. They could tell you were critically underestimated the trials that awaited you… but before they could convince you to drop out before it was too late, you noticed somebody walk in. It was a little mouse lady carrying a clipboard, and judging by her formal pencil dress, she must be one of Stinkkink’s staff. You knew what this means. “Yeah… yeah, but… hey, I’ve really gotta go. Sorry, man. Just keep your on the TV and stay tuned. I’ll do just fine. Don’t worry about it. Okay, good… mhmm, yeah, goodbye…” Eventually, you hung up on your friend, tucking your phone away.

Seeing that you were done, the mouse woman stepped forward. “Mrs. Zakia?” She asked, and you, of course, nodded. “It’s your time to shine. Right this way, please.” She turned around and started walking down the hall, and you stood and followed her. Being backstage at Stinkkink was actually kind of incredible. Compared to the dinghy trailer parks you grew up in, this place looked like some sort of advanced, sci-fi complex. “I must ask that you store all of your possessions here temporarily. They can be retrieved after you emerge from the maze,” the mouse said, leading you to a big, secure-looking safe. With a shrug, you obliged and locked your stuff inside.

With that, the mouse led you even deeper into the complex. “No, I must remind you that once you enter the maze, there is no going back. Anything can happen in there, ranging from stinky, to sexual, to potentially even lethal,” she warned you, her voice sounding quite serious. “I must also remind that you that in the event of your failure, you agree to endure whatever punishment is decided for you, up to and including death or enslavement.” You could tell she was trying to scare you… but you had your head in the game! It was way too late to back out now! Besides, you were convinced that you had nothing to be afraid of.

“Now, this is just a tip, but you should know that there are no dead ends in the maze. All paths will lead you towards your objective,” she said. “What we are testing here is your endurance, not exactly your navigation skills, although those will be useful as well.” You were hardly listening at this point, feeling excitement well up in your chest as you followed her through the complex. You could hear a crowd cheering and laughing loudly down the halls! It reminded you of your boxing days, and filled with the anticipation to leap into the limelight once again. The mouse woman sighed, seeing you weren’t taking this serious, before finally pushing open the door to the stage…

You gawk out, surprised. Putrina was standing there onstage, casually telling jokes and such to entertain the humongous audience. They weren’t particularly funny, but the audience was still laughing uproariously for some reason. “... and so I said to him, why would anyone want me to NOT sit on their face? And get this; he says, he says… oh. Uh, hold on a minute,” she stops when the mouse walks up and whispers something in her ear. With that, she sits up, adjusting her dress. “Ah! Ahem! Alright, folks. Next up to bat, we have a bare-knuckle boxer from the fine state of Kascium. She’s rough, she’s tough, she stinks to high hell; ladies and gentlemen, put your hands together for... Zakia!”

You took this as your cue to walk onto the stage, revealing yourself to the crowd. They cheered for you as you smiled out at them, chuckling as you flexed and posed for the adoring audience. You were wearing nothing but a sports bra and a pair of boxer shorts, content to show off your toned pecs and perfectly sculpted body. They crowd cooed at the sight of you. You did look pretty tough! Maybe you’d fare better than all those scrawny contestants they’d had so far. Once you were done posturing for the crowd, you take a seat across from the curvaceous skunk lady. She seemed to be wearing something that subdued her stench, which was fortunate, because otherwise, everyone in this room would be unconscious.

As you draw closer, she’s struck by the stench of your overwhelming BO. “Whew! Why, you reek even worse than some of my guardians!” She leans back, waving her hand in front of her face in an over dramatic fashion. This elicits some more laughter from her adoring fans. “What’s your secret?”

“Uh… well, I just stopped showering. I work out a lot, so, y’know, that really builds up a sweat…” You shrug. “My stink’s not really going to matter too much, though, in the end.”

“Really? I figured you were going for a victory by sheer stench,” the skunk said, tilting her head, intrigued. “Do you have some other plan in mind?”

“Yeah, actually. It's simple; anybody who messes with me in that maze is getting knocked out!” You insisted. Overcome with excitement, you stand up out of your chair and start shadow boxing the air, impressing the audience with your powerful-looking punches.

Putrina giggled at your enthusiasm. “Oh! Looks like we have a robust contestant here, folks!” She said, and you beamed a bit at her compliment. With that, she put one hand on your shoulder, and turned to the crowd. “Now, y’all know the drill. Do you have any 'requests' before she heads on in?"

You didn’t know exactly what she meant by ‘requests’. You expected them to ask you questions, or even ask for autographs or something. You didn’t expect them to start shouting out the lewdest things you could imagine! Some were calling for you to flash the waiting crowd; others wanted you to drop trough and moon them; still others wanted you to make out with Putrina right on stage. You were absolutely taken aback by their behavior! “W-what is this?”

Seeing you were confused, Purtina leans forward and whispers, trying not to be noticed. “You should probably whip your tits out or something,” she advises. “If you put on a good show now, the audience will be more likely to help you out later.”
13.title: Zakia the Hyena

132.content:
“Fuck that!” You immediately growl, feeling objectified by the crowd. You were one of the most powerful people you knew; you were definitely not something to be ogled by a crowd! The crowd’s excitement quickly turning to booing when you flipped them all the bird. “You weirdos want to see something obscene, eh? Well, here you go!” You laughed loudly, amused by the shocked and appalled looks on their once horny faces. “Yeah, you heard me! You’re all a buncha weirdos… and I’m going to mop the floor with your weird little maze!”

The audience seemed angry at you… but meanwhile, Putrina seemed excited and amused! You had gotten the crowd really riled up, which means that the ratings were going to be incredible when you finally got your comeuppance on live television! The meaner, more controversial contestants were always the ones who bring in the big bucks. “Oh! Those sound like fightin’ words to me!” She cooed, excitedly gesturing to the entrance of the maze. “You talk a big game… but why don’t we see if you can back it up, shall we?”

Your blind bravado was deflated a bit when you looked down the darkened hallways of the maze. The crowd was urging you to step inside, but for some reason, you hesitated. Guess there’s really no going back now, is there? You try not to show any fear as you step inside, and turn around to watch the huge, concrete doors at the entrance of the maze slide closed. Eventually, the doors slammed together, and the loud cheering and jeering of the crowd was completely silenced. You were alone. You stood there for a while, looking at the maze, pondering your next move.

Suddenly, you were alarmed by the sight of a small robot flying through the air down the hall! You were blinded for a moment when it shined a spotlight down on you, but when you looked at the robot, you realized it was actually a giant camera, recording your every movement! “And it looks like our latest contestant has officially entered the maze! There’s no going back now!” Putrina’s voice emanated loudly from a loudspeaker on the side of the robot. You stood there for a moment, dazed and confused. “Oh, she looks a little lost! What happened to all that bravado, dear?”

That line caused you to jump into action! You couldn’t let anybody think you were a coward! You started strutting down the hallway of the maze with as much confidence as you can muster. The cold, concrete walls all around you were huge and blank, and the maze didn’t have a roof; instead, you were treated to a full view of the beautiful nights sky above. It was actually kind of cool looking, but you couldn’t get distracted. You had to keep an eye out for any potential threats! Meanwhile, as you walked, the robot followed along behind you in the air, recording your progress.

“Oh! There she goes! Making her way towards the first branching path!” Putrina announces. Sure enough, you soon have to choose between two hallways; one on the left, and one of the right. “Now, since you’re just starting off, I’m gonna give you a little hint. Down THAT hallway is a stench challenge -” the robot shined its spotlight down the hallway to the left - “and down THIS hallway is a more sexual challenge -” the robot shined its spotlight down the hallway to the right. “They’re both pretty stinky, though, so you better be ready!”

You consider it for a moment. Your nose wasn’t that accustomed to stench, so the sexual challenge would probably be easy; but then again, that would just be giving that perverted audience exactly what they wanted. You must choose; your safety, or your dignity?
132.title: Refuse!

1321.content:
You’d rather endure some stench than give these perverts what they came here for! Besides, what’s so scary about a little stench, anyway? You’ve stunk like hell for weeks, and you’ve gotten used to your own BO. How could anyone else’s be worse? With that in mind, you head confidently down the hallway to the left, prepared to face whatever trials awaited you. Of course, it was one thing to think about noxious smells, but once they were actually assaulting your nose, it was a different story entirely. Your bravado thus faded once you travelled farther down the hallway, and a terrible stench overwhelmed you.

You were confused when you find the hallway blocked by a big olympic-sized swimming pool, complete with a single, huge 10 meter tall diving platform! More notably, though; it was the grossest damn pool you’ve ever seen. The water was murky and green like a swamp, and the entire thing smelled like farts. In fact, as you’re standing there, an immense, green bubble floats up out of the water, rising high into the air before popping, sending noxious green gas everywhere! You gag and cough at the spectacle! “Are you wondering what those bubbles are? Well, trust me; you don’t want to know!” Putrina laughs.

“Trust me, though; you DON’T want to get caught in one of them!” She warns. “So you’re going to want to make it to the other end of the pool as quickly as you can! Hope you’re a strong swimmer!” You sigh. You’re definitely not a strong swimmer, though you can probably make it to the other end of the pool at a moderate rate. If you wanted to truly beat this challenge, however, you should probably use the diving board for an easy head start. You didn’t like the idea of jumping from such a tall height, but you also didn’t want to look like a coward.

Before you knew it, there you were, 10 meters over the swamp water, preparing to jump into the disgusting pool head-first. This was going to absolutely RUIN your outfit, but you hear that the maze provides a change of clothes at each rest stop. With that, you get into position, and hesitate for a while… before finally diving it! Landing in the deep, warm water from that height knocks the breath out of you, and you linger around underwater, disoriented for a moment. Despite your better judgement, you can’t help but open your eyes… and through the murky water, you can see two, reptilian eyes staring back at you!

There was a crocodile woman in this pool! From the surface, she was completely invisible in the murky water, but just from getting a glimpse at her, you can tell she’s absolutely humongous! You let out a little squeal which is completely drowned out by the water, as you swim up to the surface, gasping as you try to thrash towards the other side of the pool. The idea of there being a massive reptile in the pool that you can’t see was terrifying to you! You never knew when she might strike! Hell, she might be beneath you at this very moment!

You swim through the swamp-like swimming pool as fast as you can, constantly fearing the gator girl’s attack. Suddenly, there’s a rumbling from below… and one of those huge bubbles rises from the water! To your horror and disgust, you realized that those stink bubbles were actually the gator’s giant, magical fart bubbles! You try your best to avoid it, but to your surprise, the massive stench bubble somehow envelops itself around your body, bit by bit. Soon, you were trapped inside the stench bubble as it rose up into the air!

You let out a squeal as you’re lifted higher and higher into the night sky, trapped in the green, magical bubble. Or at least, you try to squeal; but when you try to take a breath, you realize the only air you have to breathe was the gator’s flatulence! The air in here was the absolute worst thing you’d ever smelt! Worse still, somehow the bubble seemed to be damn near solidifying around you, the walls squeezing down around you and trapping you in a bubble made of pure farts. Panicked, you try to scratch at the walls before its too late… and sure enough, the bubble pops, and you fall back down into the pool!

You immediately emerge from the water, gasping for fresh air! That was insane! You had no idea how any of that was even possible. All you did know was that you had to make it out of this pool as fast as possible! You feared that just swimming on the surface, though, would make it easy for the gator to catch you in another bubble. Maybe if you swam down below, you could evade them… but then again, the gator herself might just snatch you down there...
1321.title: Stench Swamp

13211.content:
Overcome with horror and confusion, your primal fight or flight instincts kicked in, and they seemed to decide the best course of action was to thrash madly towards the other end of the pool, and hope you were faster than the gator. Of course, you weren’t. A reptile like her was at home in the swamp, and you, on the other hand, were hopelessly out of your element.

Meanwhile, the robot continued shining its spotlight down on you, illuminating your desperate attempts to escape from the pool. The audience watching over the video feed was laughing their asses off, watching the once overconfident hyena start panicking and freaking out at the first sign of adversity.

As you swim, you hear another rumble underwater, and soon, another huge bubble floats up from the water just a few feet away from you. For a moment, you assume she missed; but you quickly realize she was just taunting you! Trying to make it clear that she could capture you any time she wanted, and there was nothing you could do about it!

Sure enough, just as you were about to escape from the pool, you lifted your head from the water to take a breath, only to realize there wasn’t much air to breathe! Your eyes shot open, to see only the night sky through a blurry, shiny green filter. As you floated up into the air, you realize you were trapped in another fart bubble!

“Oh no, no, no, no!” You said, immediately panicking. Yelling was a bad idea, however, as you quickly used up the fresh air in the magical ‘bubble’. Soon, all you had to breath was the noxious gas of the alligator’s flatulence! You coughed, gagged and sputtered as the bubble floated up into the air, feeling the horrible stench stinging your nostrils.

Eventually, you felt the walls of the ‘bubble’ start to solidify again! Every second you spent trapped in here, the bubble became harder and harder to pop. You try scratching at the walls, but you were just too drowsy to really muster up any solid resistance. All you could do was squirm around as the bubble floated higher and higher into the night sky.

Soon, you were completely trapped inside the noxious fart bubble! Of course, that didn’t make any sense at all… but Putrina’s magic was known to be as powerful as it was confusing. You weren’t about to question the logistics of it; all you could think about was the horrible stench that was assaulting your nostrils, depriving you of any fresh, clear air!

At this point, the bubble reached its peak, and you were given a clear view of the maze from up above. It was actually rather beautiful up here, although your view was obscufated by the blurry green bubble. Of course, as it ‘solidified’, the bubble started drifting downwards, back towards the swamp.

“Oh, and it looks like Zakia is already down for the count on this one! Losing to the first challenge is DEFINITELY not a good way to start off a run! I’m not seeing much hope for this one, folks!”

You panicked a bit at the bubble sunk beneath the water, thinking you might drown or something somehow. Hell, you hardly knew what was going on. Luckily, even as you drifted down into the swamp and your entire vision was taken up by green, you could still breathe, although all you had to breathe was rank fart fumes.

You sat there, wriggling and whimpering, trapping in a magical fart bubble beneath the swamp. How the hell did you get into this mess! As if to add insult to injury, your look up to see the tall, busty crocodile lady’s huge face looming over you, a smug smirk as she admires her little ‘captive’. Yeah, yeah, she trapped you with her fart. Real funny. Laugh it up, lady. You swear, if you ever get out of here, you’d deck that alligator...

Before you knew it, she started batting the bubble around through the water! You let out a little yelp as you started getting rolled around in the stench bubble. Not only were you drowsy and disgusted, but now, you were dizzy, too! Your yelps are completely muffled by the thick swamp water as the gator bats the bubble all around, treating it like a toy…

Eventually, her playing around stops, and the bubble sinks to the bottom of the pool again. By this point, you were far too dizzy and disoriented to try and escape, or even to stay awake. Having to subsist solely on fart fumes to breathe was taxing on your health, as you can imagine. With a little sigh, you feel the last of your energy leave you, and you slowly slip into unconsciousness…

Lives Remaining: 4/5


You wake up some indeterminate amount of time later, waking with a start as if from a night terror. In fact, that’s what you wanted to imagine the day’s events as being; just a bad dream. Unfortunately, you had no such luck. You were sitting on the other edge of the pool, now, still covered in swamp water, stinking of farts and nursing a headache after what had happened to you.

You sit up… only to yelp in surprise to see the alligator leaning up out of the water! Now that you saw her in all her glory, without being obscured by the blurry water, you realized just how massive she had to be. She must be about 12 feet tall or something! “Hey, sugar. Just wanted to say, thanks for having a swim. It was fun~” With that, the gator gal disappeared beneath the water once more.

You shivered as you stood up. While that stench torture had been miserable, the humiliation on live television was even worse. With that, you continued down the hallway, noticing that your clothes are still absolutely drenched in stinky water. You travel down the empty halls, still reeling from the humiliation, until you come across another branching path...
13211.title: Swim on the surface!

choices: Go to the hall with the lipstick sign
Go to the hall with the slot machine sign
Go to the hall with the scissoring legs sign
Go to the hall with the sumo ring sign
132111.content: You stepped forwards, trying desperately to forget what happened. Fat lot of good that'll do though. You simply continued forwards, figuring you still had a chance to finish this. As you continued forwards, you noticed the hallway led to a dead end straight ahead. Along the left wall, however, were several openings deeper into the maze. Each bore a sign on the wall leading into it. The first hall had a sign with a pair of lips etched onto it. The second hall had a sign with a slot machine on it. The third hall had a sign with a pair of legs scissoring each other. And the fourth hall had a sign with a sumo ring on it. It seemed this was your only way forwards.
132111.title: Continue

13212.content:
You couldn't let this stupid maze get to you. You needed to keep a cool head, despite your powerlessness and confusion. You stop for a moment, trying to come up with a plan in a split second. You had to think outside the box. The bubbles rose, so maybe… if you swam along the bottom of the pool, you could avoid them?

That option had its own host of difficulties… but it was worth a shot. With that thought, you dived deep below the murky green water until your hands were touching the floor. Then, you basically crawled along the floor of the pool, kicking off with your legs to build up momentum.

You hated it, but you occasionally had to peek an eye open to check for that humongous gator chick. Sure enough, there she was, just a few meters away, looking a little surprised to see you down here. She was expecting to simply torment you from below, but instead, you had opted to face her on her own turf.

Of course, you didn’t have nearly the lung capacity she did. It wasn’t long before you had to submerge and gasp for air. While you’re up, you can hear Putrina’s voice saying something, but you ignore it. You only took a ‘break’ for a few seconds before continuing, and yet still, when you dived back down, you found the gator had repositioned herself, and was now waiting for you down below!

The moment you realize what she had planned, it was too late. Before you could react, the gator girl grabs you with her big, scaly hands, pulling you down to the bottom of the pool. Your scream, which would’ve gone unheard in the water anyway, was further muffled as your snout was pressed up inbetween the alligators tits, as she holds you tightly against her.

You look up at her, seeing the big, toothy grin on her huge, long snout. You didn’t know what she had planned, and you didn’t want to know. With a determined look on your face, you reached back… and punched her right in the snout! The water dulled your punch, so it didn’t really do anything damage, but it was enough to make her let you go.

While she was clutching her snout in pain, you immediately swim back up to the surface of the water, thrashing through the water as quickly as you could. You could just tell the reptile was approaching you from down below. Almost there… almost there… just a few more meters…

Just as you finally grabbed the other end of the pool, you felt the alligator grab you by the ankle from below, and try to pull you under! After punching her in the nose, she probably wanted to give you a faceful of ass or shove your snout in her armpit or something. You couldn’t let that happen!

You hold onto the side of the pool for dear life, kicking at her hand with your free foot. Unfortunately, the massive gator was just too strong for you, and it was beginning to look hopeless. Suddenly, though, Putrina’s little robot swooped down! “Hey! She made it to the end of the challenge! You’re supposed to leave her alone!” Putrina shouted, sounding outraged.

With that, the little robot fired an electrified charge of some sort into the pool! Somehow, it didn’t zap you, but it did stun the alligator, causing her to lose her grip on your ankle. Seizing the opportunity, you rolled out of the pool in a single moment, before booking it down the hallway as fast as you can, terrified that the gator was going to climb out of the pool and chase you.

That didn’t seem to be the case, though, so all you managed to do was wear yourself out. Eventually, you leaned against a nearby wall, panting and exhausted. The little flying robot soars over to you. “I’m so sorry! Some of my guardians can get a little carried away sometimes!” Putrina’s voice reassures you. “You got to the end of that challenge fair and square. Good job, newbie! Unfortunately, the next one might not be so easy…”

Well, that was good, at least. But you were starting to grow a little nervous about this maze! Apparently, with Putrina’s magic, literally anything was possible! You were going to have to keep a cool head and think outside the box if you were going to complete these challenges. You take a break there for a moment, getting your bearings, before continuing down the winding hallways of the maze. Sooner or later, you come across another branching path...
13212.title: Sink or Swim

132121.content:
Eventually, you come across another branching path. Great. You had been a little reckless last time; this time, you had to really think about your decision before you chose which path to take. Luckily, Putrina’s annoying voice was there to blithely chip in over the radio, hurting your ears somewhat.

The robot shines its spotlight on the hallway to the left, which was simply blocked by a huge concrete wall, complete with a big, metal sliding door. There was a huge, oddly-shaped keyhole, that didn’t look possible to pick. Next to it, there was a big, square hole in the ground that seemed to lead down into complete darkness, Silent Hill style.

“Bet you’re wondering how to open that door, huh? Well, the key is hidden away somewhere in here; a pit stuffed with 1,000 kilos worth of sweaty ol’ gym socks… all donated by members of our lovely audience! Yep! It’ll be like finding a key in a stinky, stinky haystack,” she laughs. “Careful, though! The last guy who crawled in there… well, the stench sorta drove him nuts. We still haven’t been able to convince him to come out. All things considered, he’s probably deranged, unpredictable, and extremely smelly. So… watch out for that!”

The robot turns to shine its light on the hallway to the right. There, you beheld a huge, fancy monastery-looking building, with all sorts of magical trinkets and artifacts. On the roof, there was a big sign showing an ancient-looking old fox man, with squinting eyes and a big bushy beard, surrounded by unbelievably busty anthro women of all shapes and sizes writhing on the ground in orgasmic bliss. In big red letters, it read; Behold the might of Aqazohr, the Sex Wizard!

“You think that sounds difficult? Well, wait till you see what the amazing Aqazohr can do! Our resident warlock is a mystical kama sutra known throughout the lands! Not only is the very air in his monastery a potent psychic aphrodisiac, but with his telekinetic powers, he can overwhelm you with pleasure without even lifting a finger!” She explains. “If you don’t think you can handle all that, you can try just knocking him out. Sure, he’s physically weak… but if you lay a finger on him, you’ll awaken his golems! And trust me when I say that, if one of his golems gets their hands on you, you’ll be walking funny for a week!”

You stand there for a moment, considering your options carefully. Both of them sounded… absolutely awful, to be honest. There was no turning back now, though, so you had to pick the one that was least likely to humiliate you. Eventually, Putrina starts bitching at you to hurry up, so you’re forced to choose...
132121.title: Continue

1322.content:
Eventually, you begrudgingly decided that the hallway on your right was your safest bet, even though you definitely weren’t looking forward to whatever kinky trials these weirdos and perverts had in mind for you. You step down the darkened hallway, only to eventually realize it was modelled after a… graveyard? Well, that wasn’t very sexy. You stand there for a moment, confused, wondering exactly what the challenge here was supposed to be. The moment you cautiously stepped foot onto the dirt of the graveyard, suddenly, the doors of the various mausoleum started sliding open!

From the mausoleums, emaciated-looking furries with blank, glowing green eyes emerged, moaning like ghosts. They were all wearing nothing but tattered rags, and kept their arms stretched out in front of them while they walked for some reason. You immediately hid behind a nearby gravestone, peeking over at them. You noticed a wolf woman slowly stumble past, whispering something under her breath. When you strained your ears enough, you could hear what she was moaning. “Coooockkks…. cooockkkss….” What the hell?

“Ah, yes! Some of you in the audience might remember these anthros as some of our former contestants!” Putrina’s voice perked up over the robot’s speaker again, as it shined its spotlight down on the ‘zombies’, disorienting them. “The poor dears ended up getting hypnotized, but their minds couldn’t handle it, so they sort of… snapped. Now, sex is literally the only thing they can think about!” Indeed, you noticed some of the ‘zombies’ jerking off or blowing eachother, but most of them seemed to stumbling around in a daze, desperately searching for somebody to fuck.

“Better stay quiet now! They’re slow, but there’s dozens of them! And trust me; you don’t want to get caught by the horde!” You shudder at the thought of getting gang-banged by an entire horde of these brainwashed fools. Not only is the blank, mindless look on their faces not very attractive, but they also stink like death! Luckily, they seemed pretty dim-witted and weak, so it would probably be easy to sneak around them, and even beat them in combat if you have to. You just had to make sure they couldn’t take you by surprise, or outnumber you…

You try sneaking around the outer areas of the graveyard, but you soon find your path blocked by a wolf ‘zombie’ who was leaning against a nearby wall. As you grew closer, you realized he was stroking his hand up and down his surprisingly length, pink shaft, his tongue hanging from his mouth as he mindlessly jacks off. You flinch a bit in disgust. There seemed to be no way to sneak past him without him seeing you, so it seemed you were going to have to knock him out. Luckily, he wasn’t very observant, so you were easily able to sneak up behind him.

You suddenly reach forward and pull him off his feet, wrapping your muscular arm around the neck and locking him in a sleeper hold! He let's out a little grunt, but to your surprise, he doesn’t even try to resist you. In fact, he just keeps jerking off! As the wolf slowly slips into unconsciousness, he let's out a little gasp, and sprays a prodigious amount of cum all over the ground in front of him. You gag a bit, as you let the unconscious wolf fall to the ground. “Ugh! Nasty...” You whisper to yourself, disgusted. Were these really what remained of some previous contestants? How could they have been reduced to… this?

You take a deep breath, before continuing to sneak around the graveyard, taking care not to accidentally step in that canine’s jizz. You manage to sneak halfway through the graveyard with ease, taking advantage of these brainwashed ‘zombies’ lack of intelligence. You grew too overconfident, though, and started getting reckless, not checking corners as thoroughly as you should have. Suddenly, a zombie you passed by without noticing grabs you from behind! “Tiiiiitttsss…! Tiiiiiitttsssss…!” The brainwashed feline moaned, his manhood poking you in the back as he wraps his arms around you.

You immediately spin around and elbow him in the face, and the ‘zombie’ falls to the ground, unconscious. Still, his shouting alerted the others, and you can already hear the other zombies moaning loudly, realizing there was a non-zombie in the graveyard. You can hear them shuffle steadily towards you from all around, and you start to get a little worried. From this spot, they probably have you surrounded on all sides… you are, however, fortunately next to mausoleum.

If you want to fight the horde, you can step into the mausoleum; the entrance is tight, so you’ll only have to fight one zombie at a time. If you want to flee, you can try climbing onto the roof of the mausoleum and jumping from rooftop to rooftop, but if you slip and fall, you’ll fall directly into the horde! You only had a few seconds to decide on a plan as the horny, hypnotized ‘zombies’ close in...
1322.title: Sex Zombies

14.content:
Name: Richard Baily
Sex: Male
Species: Rabbit
A Small Bio: Richard is a white rabbit who had fallen on hard times, he was given a flyer to the stink kink maze, and decided to give it a try. "I mean, I deal with horrible smells at work all day long anyway" Was his famous last words before he was whisked away to the competition
And the contestant stats, which are rated on a scale of 0 to 10:
Stench: (The stink potential of the contestant) 6.5
Sensitivity: (The contestant's ability to handle stink, higher means more succeptible) 4.5
Endurance: (How long the contestant can last before an orgasm lower means less time) 5
Likability: (How much aid the audience is willing to give you) 7.5
14.title: Down the rabbit hole!

choices: You go in with what you have
You decide to sell a few lives, then you win something no matter what
151.content:
Name: Rick West
Sex: M
Species: Human
Bio: A nice guy from suburbia, he's always been a good friend and neighbor. A scrawny, bookish lad, he's currently looking to get into college, but has no means of getting the money together without going into debt. When told about the maze, he was hesitant due to his sensitive nose and high libido, combined with his lack of physicality, but eased out when he learned that the audience can help a competitor if they like him enough. He's hoping to ride this contest on his good nature and audience generosity.

Stats:
Stench:0
Sensitivity:10
Endurance:1
Likeability:10

*****

"Alright Mr. West, it's almost time for you to go on. Any reconsideration about doing this. You do know what happens if you lose right?" Asked the cat attendant in charge of overseeing you before the contest starts.

"No backing out now. I need that money for my tuition." You reply. The green light goes off, signaling your cue to go on stage. "Well, looks like it's time."

"Good luck." She says as you walk out onto the stage. You nearly went blind and deaf from the bright lights and the roar of the crowd respectively. You see the host, Putrina, standing by a door waiting for you.

"Ladies and gentlemen, introducing our newest competitor, Rick West." She announces while you approach her. "It's rare that we get a human to compete in this little contest of ours. Now then, this is normally the part where I send you in so you can get started, but I've been looking over your file, and I have to say that you are probably not going to last long in this little game. So, I feel like pulling out something a little special for you. I call it the 'pity trade'. How this little gimmick works is, you can 'sell' up to four of your five lives. For each one you sell, we'll give you $50,000 even if you lose. But, since you'll have less lives to work with in the maze, you have a higher chance of losing early on. Take your pick. Will you sell?"
151.title: Contestant 5

choices: You are already found by a guardian
152.content:
Name: Tom Malodori
Sex: M
Species: Skunk
Bio: Putrina's husband, or rather, ex-husband. After a heated argument over this very show, Putrina thew him to the curb and kept the house. He wants his wife back and will even compete on this show to get her back. Living with his wife has trained his nose to handle most smells as well as his sexual endurance. He's also trained his body in an attempt to deal with whatever a pissed off ex with a torture game show can throw at a man. What he doesn't know, however, is that ever since the divorce, Putrina has been painting him in a negative light to her audience, meaning he's going into hostile territory, even with his good nature.

Stats:
Stench:9
Sensitivity:2
Endurance:6
Likeability: 1

*****

You're sitting in the waiting room you were lead to, contemplating what's lead you here, and all the regrets that came with it. You regret blowing up at your wife over this show, you regret not communicating better, and you especially regret calling her a murderer and psychopath. You should've calmed down and thought things through. Maybe then you wouldn't be about to run the very course you hated just to get her back.

"It's time Mr. Malodori." A bunny anthro assistant says as she approaches you. You start to stand up, only for her to spit in your face. "Sorry, miss Putrina ordered me to do that."

"It's fine. Honestly, I'm surprised she didn't have you kick me in the balls." You jokingly reply as you walk out onto the stage. You are quickly met by a flood of booing from the audience.

"Ladies and gentlemen, our latest contestant, my ex-husband Tom." The boos continue as you approach your ex-wife. "He's here in an attempt to win me back. Let's see if he wants me bad enough to survive the maze he hates so much. You can start whenever, Tom."

Putrina smirked. When she heard you were going to compete she bumped you up to the top of the waiting list. Now, she's pulled out all the stops for you. Her worst challenges, guardians, and elites are within this maze. Whether or not she would actually accept your apology was still in the air right now, but until then, she was gonna enjoy your squirming. You run into the maze and begin the game.

What happens next?
152.title: Contestant 6

info.brief_description: Ready your noses for the worst smelling gameshow on television!
info.description:
Welcome to the StinkKink Maze, with your beautiful skunk hostess, Putrina Malodori! The nastiest, smelliest adult gameshow in existence! The prizes are immense, but so are the punisments for losing! Do you have what it takes to stay awake and keep it in your pants in the rankest place on Earth?

The rules are fairly straightforward. If a contestant can make it to the end of the maze before losing all your "lives," they win! If they lose all five lives, they lose! There is no time limit, and there are rest stops! The maze is full of traps, pitfals, and "guardians" all perfectly able to render contestants unconscious with stench! The audience is also welcome to join in on the fun! At every rest stop, the audience can vote to help or hinder the contestant with a variety of options. Contestants could end up with a stun gun, or buried under a pile of stinky socks at audience discretion!

Lives are lost in one of two ways. Either by passing out from stink, or by reaching an orgasm. Lives can be gained if a contestant manage to stink out one of the "guardians" patrolling the maze, but that's a rather difficult thing to pull off!

If a contestant loses all of their lives, they are brought to the Room of Judgement where our lovely hostess will spin the Wheel of Punishment to determine what the loser must endure! The ten possible fates are listed below:

1. A full-body skunking from Putrina!
2. Life as Putrina's slave!
3. A new job as a maze guardian!
4. Getting petrified and made into a maze decoration!
5. A whiff of Putrina's sneakers, guaranteed to make you forget the past year!
6. Another go at the maze!
7. Being turned into clothes for Putrina!
8. A nice, long, brainwashing, ending with you becoming a slave to a guardian!
9. An entire day's worth of post orgasm torture!
10. Death by farts in the Stink Box!

Contestants may come from all walks of life, even some light offense criminals may compete for the prize of early parole! At the start of each episode, we will show you a stat card for the current contestant with the following information:
Name:
Sex:
Species:
A Small Bio:
And the contestant stats, which are rated on a scale of 0 to 10:
Stench: (The stink potential of the contestant)
Sensitivity: (The contestant's ability to handle stink, higher means more succeptible)
Endurance: (How long the contestant can last before an orgasm lower means less time)
Likability: (How much aid the audience is willing to give you)

One last thing, some guardians in the maze have green, softly glowing irises. These guardians are considered "elite" and should a contestant lose their last life to one, there is no punishment wheel. The elite decides their fate.

At the moment, only one elite guardian has been found by contestants, the Stinx! The Stinx is a huge Sphinx woman who at first, won't seem to smell at all. In actuality, she's enchanted her body so only a direct sniff will give someone that knockout stink! And when we say knockout, we mean nobody has ever stayed awake past one sniff. The Stinx will ask a contestant three riddles. If they get the first wrong, they'll be knocked out by her paws. If they get the second wrong, they'll be made to faint from her breath. If they get the third wrong, she will gas them out. If a contestant gets all three riddles wrong, the Stinx will keep knocking them out until no lives remain!

And that's all for now! Tune in tomorrow for the first episode of the StinkKink maze!


Aaannnd now for a few author notes: Potential contestants can be human or anthro animals while guardians can be the same, or can be feral animals or mythological creatures like Sphinxes. No Pokemon this time unless there's a real big demand for it! Also, while some other kinks will be allowed, stink should obviously be the main focus, andas always, I don't want scat, watersports, or gore in this.
